product_name: Columbia Super Bahama Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Handy pockets, venting and UPF 30 sun protection make the women's Columbia Super Bahama Shirt a perfect fit for the discerning outdoorswoman. Nylon/polyester fabric dries quickly for functional performance on the water. Protects you from harmful UV rays, whether you're on the water all day or hiking ridgelines. Hidden venting at mid-back keeps cool air flowing through for comfort. Columbia Super Bahama Shirt for women features a wealth of pockets for stashing hiking and angling gear. Closeout.
short_description: Handy pockets, venting and UPF 30 sun protection make the women's Columbia Super Bahama Shirt a perfect fit for the discerning outdoorswoman.
